channel.title: [PI] Donator and mod icons
channel.description:
I have a little problem with the modicons not being for the correct player right
When mods send you a personal message it sends a donor crown, and also i wanna make it so the donator crown shows when donator status =1 instead of making player rights 4 show it... im using hybrid pvp v3 :) here an example of the bug...
[img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/8672/buggedmods.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] Donator and mod icons
item.dc:creator: @Darkmist Darkmist
item.description:
@Darkmist wrote:

Iv gone into the cache and tryed replacing the icons around and stuff, but then the donator crown doesnt appear at all LOL, I dont have it show up when u talk cos i made my donators have donator status instead of playerirghts 4, i went into commands and changed my yell command to show the other number for the donor icon, and that didnt even work :\ so im not sure…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Donator and mod icons
item.dc:creator: @macca4g macca4g
item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

You just need to change your interface icon i had this problem with my PI i just changed the cache your client is registered to that icon so find the icon name go into your client find the icon number and change to the crown = done
Hope i helped =-)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Donator and mod icons
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

You could simply find the photo and swap it with the mod icon(in the cache). That’d be the easiest way.
Remember to make sure its the same size, file type, name

Read full topic
